New Records: Nikola Jokić is the first player in NBA history with 37+ points, 18+ rebounds, and 15+ assists in a game
Nikola Jokić posted his 20th career game with at least 40-10-5 on 60% shooting, joining Wilt Chamberlain (22) as the only players with as many such games
Key Match Events: Michael Porter Jr. hit the game-winning floater with 6.5 seconds left to lift the Nuggets over the Mavericks
Kyrie Irving scored 43 points, 5 rebounds, 5 assists, and 6 threes for the Mavericks
Nikola Jokić recorded a triple-double with 37 points, 18 rebounds, and 15 assists

DeMar DeRozan scored a game-high 34 points to give him 252 for his first 10 games as a King – joining Oscar Robertson (255) and Mitch Richmond (257) as the only players with 250+ points in their first 10 games with the franchise
Pre-Game Insights: Nikola Jokić is expected to make history with a potential triple-double against the Mavericks
The game is part of the Emirates NBA Cup 2024, with key matchups including Mavs vs Warriors and Nuggets vs Mavericks
Post-Match Reflections: Nikola Jokić expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win
The game was part of a 5-game winning streak for the Nuggets
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game included 22 lead changes and 15 ties
Kyrie Irving scored 43 points, 5 rebounds, 5 assists, and 6 threes for the Mavericks
Nikola Jokić's performance helped the Nuggets overcome a 43-point night from Kyrie Irving
